blogPost.excerpt: Use the tools you know. Respect users' privacy. Forget cookie consents. Comply with GDPR, ePrivacy, COPPA, CalOPPA, PECR, PIPEDA, CASL; you name it.
blogPost.body: Use the tools you know. Respect users' privacy. Forget cookie consents. Comply with GDPR, ePrivacy, COPPA, CalOPPA, PECR, PIPEDA, CASL; you name it.
blogPost.title: Privera - Privacy-first, ethical and cookieless Google Analytics
blogPost.author: Farzad Senart

localize.description: 使用你知道的工具。尊重用户的隐私。忘掉cookie同意。遵守GDPR、ePrivacy、COPPA、CalOPPA、PECR、PIPEDA、CASL等标准。
localize.tagline: 隐私优先，道德和无熟人的谷歌分析。

localize.description: 使用你知道的工具。尊重用戶的隱私。忘掉cookie同意。遵守GDPR、ePrivacy、COPPA、CalOPPA、PECR、PIPEDA、CASL等標準。
localize.tagline: 隱私優先，道德和無熟人的谷歌分析。

previous.excerpt: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are cutting-edge websites that behave like native apps. They're installable, fast, work offline, and open in their own native window. Pep turns your existing website into a PWA in one line of code.
previous.title: Pep - Turn your site into a fast, installable Progressive Web App

localize.description: 渐进式网络应用(PWA)是表现得像本地应用的尖端网站。它们可以安装，快速，离线工作，并在自己的本地窗口中打开。Pep只需一行代码就能将您现有的网站变成一个PWA。
localize.tagline: 将您的网站变成一个快速的、可安装的渐进式网络应用。

localize.description: 漸進式網絡應用(PWA)是表現得像本地應用的尖端網站。它們可以安裝，快速，離線工作，並在自己的本地窗口中打開。Pep只需一行代碼就能將您現有的網站變成一個PWA。
localize.tagline: 將您的網站變成一個快速的、可安裝的漸進式網絡應用。

next.excerpt: With DesignTern we give you a platform to explore a list of Design Internships openings from the biggest companies around the world. You can also use DesignTern to post your own Design Internship opening for your company.
next.title: DesignTern - Easily Explore & Apply to Design Internships

localize.description: 通过DesignTern，我们为您提供了一个平台，让您探索全球最大公司的设计实习机会列表。你也可以使用DesignTern来发布你自己的公司的设计实习机会。
localize.tagline: 轻松探索和申请设计实习机会

localize.description: 通過DesignTern，我們爲您提供了一個平臺，讓您探索全球最大公司的設計實習機會列表。你也可以使用DesignTern來發布你自己的公司的設計實習機會。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆探索和申請設計實習機會
